import React, { Component } from 'react' class Options extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.initialState = { questions: [], answers: [], turn: -1, retNbr: 3, indriRetNbr: 100, nodeThreshold: 0.75, edgeThreshold: 0.0, convquery: "conv_uw", h1: 0.6, h2: 0.3, h3: 0.1 }; this.state = this.initialState; } handleChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }); this.props.onChange(name, value); } render() { const { retNbr, indriRetNbr, nodeThreshold, edgeThreshold, h1, h2, h3 } = this.state; return (
Advanced Options
Hyperparameters for Scoring (values must sum up to 1.0)
); } } export default Options;
